title: Patient-Reported Outcomes in Older Adults With Transthyretin Amyloid Cardiomyopathy - JACC

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: EQ-5D-5 L and MLHFQ predictive of all-cause mortality and HF-related hospitalization in ATTR-CM.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate ePRO dashboards to track PROs alongside CV outcomes in trials.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸŸ¡ NOTABLE]**: FDA recognizing PROs as key endpoints, influencing trial design.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias in trials may affect clinical validity of PROs.
